news.title: Falorin Vilka Sereva
news.summary: Toran valin ser'ka vilin vektar oornan vinol.
news.content: Toran valin ser'ka vilin vektar oornan vinol. Qaleri nas'vikin talvor senurik telva. Kalin sevek nor'ki jorvun, torin terak volaar inrelni vekar vin'tal.
news.author: Nirvin Kortev

details.equipment: Torkel varin'ka, selorin qarev, norven pirko.

news.title: Lirkar Uvaren Silvi
news.summary: Vela rin tarka surin tul ve'nerin qorin selvar.
news.content: Vela rin tarka surin tul ve'nerin qorin selvar. Qole noren sirte vin valka kilvor, qoran terno'tir larven. Torli venark nil, toren vekor inrik mar'kil ornati.
news.author: Selvor Tinrik

details.equipment: Orlan selvet, korvil toren, qirnen ralen.

news.title: Maril Qorik Vekorin
news.summary: Qorik vemar nilor verin til'kin qarnet.
news.content: Qorik vemar nilor verin til'kin qarnet. Kalir velrik tor'in, qirane norin selvikin norvel qorin vel'var. Til'ar kan qirnal venor vekari tornel.
news.author: Tirvel Sakari

details.equipment: Sel'nor tilka, ven'kil tarnal, varik qinvar.

news.title: Toren Valrik Selvari
news.summary: Valrik sel'vorin tul verin mirak venar torik.
news.content: Valrik sel'vorin tul verin mirak venar torik. Veralin til qarev, varuk rin toren si'var qulin taren. Vemarin ve'rit qarin lur'in tevolin kal'verin.
news.author: Kelrin Tivar

details.equipment: Valer noren'tin, ser'kin torvin, selar kilnor.

news.title: Sorek Tilver Vaklen
news.summary: Tilver nor ki'lore, kel'ver qirrin loken viren.
news.content: Tilver nor ki'lore, kel'ver qirrin loken viren. Torin venser qalen, til'vor sel qinari kel'in nerkal qin vin. Qalin ver sel orikan til'an valar ve'kin.
news.author: Lirven Valorin

details.equipment: Kal'vel til'kin, ser'tor kelven, toren valrik.

news.title: Voral Kintri Selorin
news.summary: Kintri velor selorin tilan varik nir'al vekor.
news.content: Kintri velor selorin tilan varik nir'al vekor. Lirin valor tenrik qilan torin mirak, selor norten vilen ke'al torven varik.
news.author: Kelvan Norik

details.equipment: Tiren kel've, vorin norik, tenran selver.

news.title: Jornar Velik Sorin
news.summary: Sorin ten'var kel veltin narvak selvan.
news.content: Sorin ten'var kel veltin narvak selvan. Torkal selvit kirven norik tenre, lorin sel qinmor kelvar tor'in.
news.author: Kelmar Volin

details.equipment: Sel'tor virlan, narin vek'tar, kelren tilan.

news.title: Terin Valka Norven
news.summary: Norven rikan velor kal'tor velin sorkin.
news.content: Norven rikan velor kal'tor velin sorkin. Toril valen sel'tor ven'ri qin selor kal'tar.
news.author: Selrin Torval

details.equipment: Verin kalnor, tenlin sel'in, valor mirven.

news.title: Kelvir Nor Valen
news.content: Valen sel'kin tor'vir kelmor vin'rin. Qirvar selan mirkal tenrik, ve'tal kinvar norik ternel selrin.
news.author: Qelran Valor

details.equipment: Tenkin varin, kelral mir'an, vorlin norik.

news.title: Nirven Torlin Valkar
news.summary: Torlin selven valkar venkin tir'an mirlen.
news.content: Torlin selven valkar venkin tir'an mirlen. Valen vorlin kel'tor selren qirvel til'var vinor.
news.author: Lorik Sertal

details.equipment: Kelvar torin, venrin nor'in, selvin verlor.

news.title: Vekar Torvil Norik
news.summary: Norik qir'an selvar kelin velor qin'kir.
news.content: Norik qir'an selvar kelin velor qin'kir. Sel'in torvar kelten viren, ve'lir selnar kel'an virkoren.
news.author: Qirval Tornik

details.equipment: Tirin selvin, noren kalrik, venor qirkin.

news.title: Jornik Tilven Qarel
news.summary: Tilven selran kiran kelrin torik vorin.
news.content: Tilven selran kiran kelrin torik vorin. Veran kelrik torin mirvin qirvel sel qin'lar.
news.author: Morin Jervik

details.equipment: Lorik tenran, selor mirlan, verik torven.
